title: Ep 314 | Uncle Si Will Never Fight a Girl, But It's Not Why You Think & the Champion Arm Wrestler
description:
Phil and Si remember racing cars on foot to earn extra money and prove their manliness. Arm-wrestling champion "Monster" Michael Todd shares his crazy adventures. Phil reminisces about his arm-wrestling days and makes it very clear why those days are over. Monster talks about fracturing his arm more than 70 times — and he's not done yet. Jay Stone tells Si about a girl at his gym that took him down. Al tells the story of his appendix rupturing. And Si says he'd never fight a girl, but it's not for the reason you think.

Watch Si Robertson's new Duck Call Room podcast: https://youtube.com/duckcallroom
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
